repnme.cdata!:
Sao Tome and Principe - Structural
            Adjustment Program Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The First Structural Adjustment Credit
            and Special African Facility Credit will provide US$7.0
            million to support the Government's economic recovery
            program and allow economic activity to expand while the
            reform program is implemented. The policy package includes a
            major exchange rate devaluation, monetary and fiscal
            policies including the restructuring of the public
            investment program and of loss-making public enterprises. It
            also includes price liberalization and an incentive package
            to facilitate private initiative. The structural adjustment
            program will improve the growth prospects of the economy
            through better incentives, an adequate supply of producer
            and consumer goods, more efficient allocation of foreign
            exchange and concentration of investment in the productive
            sectors. Also, it will help to create an environment
            favorable to private initiative and investment.
